name: Freeway Template
summary: Learn about .FWTEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The FWTEMPLATE file may be predefined and included with the application or created by a user. The predefined templates are designed to reflect a certain style such as dark, light, liquid, and static.

description: An FWTEMPLATE is a template document to create websites without writing any code. It was developed by Freeway Pro and provides a way to create multiple templates that can be readily used to create website documents. FWTEMPLATE files contains information about a websiteâ€™s appearance (UI) and its layout for organizing various parts of the website. This can be used to create a theme based template once and use mutliple times. FWTEMPLATE files can be opened with Softpress Freeway Pro.

Website document template created and used by Freeway Pro, an OS X WYSIWYG app that allows users to create websites without coding; stores a website template, which contains information about a website appearance and layout; similar to the .FREEWAY document but used for implementing a popular theme multiple times.
